text:
When calling ANT.BAT with all the parameters passed through ANT_ARGS and no
parameters on the ANT command line (eg: CALL ANT.BAT), ANT.BAT always set an
ERRORLEVEL of 1 even if the build succeeds. The source of the problem is "set
ANT_CMD_LINE_ARGS=" in ANT.BAT. It ANT_CMD_LINE_ARGS is not defined, which
happens if all the arguments are passed through ANT_ARGS, trying to undefined an
undefined environment variable sets ERRORLEVEL to 1. The solution is to set
ANT_CMD_LINE_ARGS to a dummy value before unsetting it. Eg: "set
ANT_CMD_LINE_ARGS=SetToDummyValueToAvoidErrorlevel1WhenUnset".
